fields.name: Nature Spirits
fields.description: Generic monsters and beasts. Also represents grasslands and canyons.

fields.name: Deep Savers
fields.description: Aquatic or ice-related Digimon. Can represent the ocean or arctic.

fields.name: Nightmare Soldiers
fields.description: Darkness or spirit based Digimon, or Digimon based on traditional 'Halloween' monsters like vampires, werewolves, or Japanese youkai and demons. Can represent haunted or cursed areas.

fields.name: Wind Guardians
fields.description: Flying, air, or plant based Digimon. Can represent forests and the sky.

fields.name: Metal Empire
fields.description: Machine, cyborg, or other mechanical Digimon. Can represent cities and factories.

fields.name: Dark Area
fields.description: Villainous, demonic, terrifying, evil Digimon. Can represent the Dark Area of the Digital World.

fields.name: Virus Busterss
fields.description: Heroic or angelic Digimon, often includes main characters from the anime or manga. Can represent the sky or heavens.
